discussion.content:
answer DE.
pickup (call-manager-fallback)

To enable the PickUp soft key on all Cisco IP phones, allowing an external Direct Inward Dialing (DID) call coming into one extension to be picked up from another extension during SRST, use the pickup command in call-manager-fallback configuration mode

choices.A: Calls ringing an unassigned directory number are forwarded to the audio attendant.
choices.E: The PickUp soft key is on all SRST phones. CE
choices.B: The GPickUp soft key is on all SRST all SRST phones.
choices.D: Calls coming into one directory number can be picked up from another directory number.
choices.C: Calls coming into a Cisco Unified Communications Manager registered phone can be picked up by a SRST phone.

questions.question_text: Which two results occur in SRST mode if the pickup command is configured under the call-manager-fallback section of a router? (Choose two.)

choices.E: primary Cisco Unified Communications Manager node from configuration file, additional nodes during registration A

questions.question_text: Which component provides a list of Cisco Unified Communications Manager node addresses that allow the phone to register to the cluster?
Which device must be responsible for properly marking network traffic when a Cisco IP phone is connected to a Cisco switch?

Which two options are dial plan elements that Global Dial Plan Replication allows independent clusters to share with each other using the Intercluster Lookup
Service (Choose two.)

choices.D: Configure a SIP trunk with Cisco Unified Communications manager destination IP addresses.
choices.C: Configure a SIP trunk security profile.
choices.F: Configure a transform that converts numbers to appropriate domains.
choices.E: Configure a neighbor zone that contains the Cisco Unified Communications Manager
choices.B: Configure a route pattern zone that contains the Cisco Unified Communications manager.
choices.A: Configure a search rule calls to the Cisco Unified Communications manager?

questions.question_text: Which three steps are required to configure a SIP trunk on Cisco VCS towards Cisco Unified Communications Manager? (Choose three.)
